intro.p: This is the 0.8.2 release of the GStreamer Python bindings. It should be used with the 0.8.x series of GStreamer and GStreamer Plug-ins.
This is the third stable 0.8.0 gst-python release, it's now considered stable and ready to be used in production. It's already being used by serveral applications.

features.feature: Dict-like access to Structure and Caps
Access to Buffer and Event fields
Overriding of Object, Element and Bin virtual methods posssible
